meanings.definition: A digital audio or video file or recording that can be streamed or downloaded from the internet.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to a podcast on my phone.
meanings.sent2: She discovered a new podcast about science.
meanings.sent3: The podcast about cats made me laugh so much.
meanings.sent4: His podcast on history is a treasure trove of information.
meanings.sent5: The podcast on gardening was as refreshing as a cool breeze.

meanings.definition: To create or participate in the production of a podcast.
meanings.sent1: They plan to podcast about their road trip.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys podcasting about technology trends.
meanings.sent3: She decided to podcast about her baking adventures.
meanings.sent4: Podcasting their conversations felt like sharing secrets with the world.
meanings.sent5: The team will podcast their journey to success for others to learn from.
